Jasmine Javascript Testing book

07 Oct 2013

Hey guys it's been a long time without posts! So I'm here to recommend a book, that my co-worker and friend Paulo Ragonha recently wrote.

Jasmine Javascript Testing is a book about how to be a pro in javascript testing.

I highly recommend the reading, since you will learn a lot of good practices when developing modern Javascript aplications.

Hope you enjoy!
